englishTitle: Þe Liflade of St. Juliana : from two Old English manuscripts of 1230 A.D. / with renderings into modern English, by Oswald Cockayne, and Edmund Brock ; edited by Oswald Cockayne [electronic text].

text.0:
JULIANA.  [Royal MS. 17 A. xxvii]. Her cum&slong;eð þe uie of seinte iuliane. ant telleð of liflade hire. IN ure lauerdes luue þe is feader of frum&slong;chaft. ant on 
his deorewurðe &slong;unes nome. ant o þes haliga&slong;tes. þat 
glideð of ham baðen. alle lewede men. þat under&slong;tonden 
ne mahen latines ledene. liðin. & lu&slong;tnin ane meidenes 
liflade. þat is of latin iturnd into engli&slong;ch. þat te lif hali 
lefdi. in heouene luuie us þe mare. ant of þis lihinde lif: leade us wið hire erndunge. þe is icoren of cri&slong;t into þe 
eche of heouene. Þeo&slong; meiden. ant tis martir. wes iuliane inempnet. in 
nichomedes burh.  & of heðene cun icumen. ant 
hire fle&slong;chliche feder wes affrican ihaten. of þe heðene 
me&slong;t þeo þat cri&slong;tene weren: derfliche droh ham to deaðe. 
ah heo as þeo þat te heouenlich feder luuede. leafde al hire 
aldrene lahen. & bigon to luuien þene liuiende lauerd þe 
luf&slong;um godd. þat wi&slong;&slong;eð ant weldeð al þat is on worlde: 
& al þat iwraht is.  Þa wes biþon time as redegunge 
telleð. Maximian þe modi kei&slong;er ine rome heinde ant 
heriende heðene mawmez. wið unmeð muchel hird & 
unduhti duheðe. & fordemde alle þeo: þe on drihtin bilefden. 
þes Maximian luuede an heh mon of cunne ant 
eke riche of rente elew&slong;ius wes ihaten. ant weren as 
feolahes þurh muche freont&slong;chipe. þis meidenes feder 
& he. weren &slong;wiðe wel togederes. as he &slong;umchere i&slong;eh hire utnume feir. ant freoliche. he felde him iwundet. 
þat wið uten lechnunge of hire libben he ne mahte. 
Affrican wi&slong;te wel þat he we&slong; freo boren. & þat him 
walde bicumen a freo boren burde. ant &yogh;ettede him his dohter. & wes &slong;one ihond&slong;ald al hire unwilles. 
ah heo tru&slong;te on him þat ne trukeneð namon: þat 
tru&slong;teð treowliche on him. ant euch deis dei eode 
to chirche to leornen godes lare. &yogh;eornliche to witen 
hu ha mahte be&slong;t witen hire unweommet. & hire meiðhad 
wiðuten man of monne. Elew&slong;ius þe luuede hire 
longe hit him þuhte. þat tis dede nere idon. þat 
heo ibroht were þurh wedlac to bedde. ah as ha wende  hire &slong;umme&slong; weis to witene. &slong;ende him to &slong;eggen. þat nalde ha 
lihten &slong;wa lahe ne nehlechen him for nan liuiende mon. er 
þen he were under Maximian hehe&slong;t in rome þat is heh reue. 
Sone &slong;o he iherde þis. he bi-&yogh;et et te kei&slong;er þat he &yogh;ettede 
him Altered from hem. reue to beonne as þat he i&yogh;irnd hefde. ant he as me 
þa luuede. lette leaden him into ture. & te riche riden in. 
& tuhen him &yogh;ont te tun: from &slong;trete to &slong;trete. ant al þe 
tur wes bitild. þat he wes in. wið purpre wið pal. & wið ciclatun . & deorewurðe claðes. as þe þat heh þing hefde to 
heden. ant þa he hefde þis idon: he &slong;ende hire to &slong;eggen. 
þat he hefde hire wil iwraht. & heo &slong;chulde his wurchen. IUliane þe edie ihesu cri&slong;te&slong; leouemon of his bli&slong;fule  luue balde hire &slong;eoluen. &slong;ende him to on&slong;were. bi 
an of hire &slong;onden.  Elew&slong;iu&slong; wite þu hit wel ireadi. 
wraðði &slong;o þu wraðði. no lengre nulich hit heolen 
þe. &yogh;ef þu wult leauen þe lahen þat tu li&slong;t in. ant leuen 
in godd feder. & in his deorewurðe &slong;une. & iþe hali ga&slong;t. 
ichulle wel neomen þe. &yogh;ef þu nult no: þu art wundi of me. 
& oðer luue &slong;ech þe.  Þa þe reue iherde þis: he wreððede 
him &slong;wiðe. & hire feder cleopede. ant feng on to tellen 
him. hu his dohter droh him from deie to deie. ant efter 
þat he wende to habben his iwil &slong;o ha him þis word 
&slong;ulliche &slong;ende.  Bi þat ilke godd quoð hire feder þat me 
is lað to gremien beo hit &slong;oð þat tu &slong;ei&slong;t to wraðer heale 
&slong;eide ha hit. ant nu ichulle o great grome al biteachen hire 
þe. to wurchen þi wil. & al þat te wel likeð as mit tin 
ahne. & me cleopede hire forð biuoren hire feder. & he 
feng feire to fondin his dohter Mi deorewurðe dohter hwer 
fore uor&slong;ake&slong;tu þi &slong;y. ant ti &slong;elhðe. þe weolen ant te 
wunnen þat walden awakenin ant waxen of þi wedlac. þat 
ich þe to reade. for he i&slong; inoh lauerd elew&slong;ius ine rome. & 
tu maht beon leafdi dohter &yogh;ef þu wel wult. Iuliane þe   eadie on&slong;werede him & &slong;eide a&slong; þeo þat ine godd hire 
hope hefde. &yogh;ef he wule leuen an god al mihti. þenne mei 
he &slong;peoken þrof & inohraðe &slong;peden. ant &yogh;ef þat he nule 
nawt. ne &slong;chal wiuen on me. wiue þer hi&slong; wil is. þa hire 
feder iherde þis: þa feng he to &slong;werien.  Bi mi kinewurðe 
lauerd apollo. ant bi mi deore leafdi diane. þat ich 
muche luuie. &yogh;ef þu halde&slong;t heron. ichulle leoten deor to 
teoren ant to luken þe. & &yogh;eouen þi fle&slong;ch: to A hole in the MS. fuheles of 
þe lufte. Iuliane him on&slong;werede & &slong;ofteliche &slong;eide. ne wen 
þu nawiht leoue feder. þat tu affeare me &slong;wa. for ihesu 
cri&slong;t godes &slong;une þat ich on leue & luuie as lauerd luf&slong;ume&slong;t 
on liue. þah ich beo forbernd. & to loken limel. 
nulich heronont buhen þe nawiht Þa feng eft hire feder on wið olhnunge to fondin &yogh;ef he mahte ei&slong;weis 
wenden hire heorte.  & &slong;eide hire luf&slong;umliche.  þat 
 
ne &slong;chulde ha nane wunne lihtliche wilnin: þat he ne &slong;chulde 
welden. wið þat ha walde hire þonc wenden Nai quoð þat 
meiden &slong;chuldich don me to him þat is alle deoulen bitaht. 
& to eche deð idemet. to furwurðen wið him world abuten 
ende. for hi&slong; wedlake&slong; weole oðer for eni wunne. for &slong;oð 
ich hit &slong;egge unwurð i&slong; hit me. ichulle þat he hit wite wel. ant tu eke mid him þat ich am iweddet to an þat ichulle 
treowliche to halden ant wið uten le&slong; luuien. þe i&slong; unlich 
him. & alle worldlich men. ne nullich him nowðer leauen. 
ne lihen for weole ne for wunne. for wa. ne for wunne 
þet &yogh;e mahen don me. þa feng hire feder te wreððen 
&slong;wiðe ferlich & &slong;wiðe hokerliche freinede.  Me hwet i&slong; 
he þes were þat tu art to iweddet. þat tu haue&slong;t wið uten 
me þine luue ilene t A hole in the MS. for hwam þu lete&slong;t lutel of þat tu 
&slong;chulde&slong;t luuien. ne ich neuer þat ich wite ne&slong; wið him 
icnawen.  For gode quoð þet meiden þin harm i&slong; þe 
mare nawt forþi þet tu naue&slong;t ofte iherd of him &yogh;are. þat i&slong; 
ie&slong;u godes &slong;une. þe forto le&slong;en moncun þat forloren &slong;chulden 
beon: lette hi&slong; deorwurðe lif on rode. ne ich ne &slong;eh him 
neuer þat me &slong;are forþuncheð. ah ichim luuie ant leue 
a&slong; on lauerde. ne &slong;ehal me fir&slong;in him from: nowðer deouel 
ne mon.  For mi lif quoð hire feder þe &slong;chal laðin hi&slong; 
luue for þu &slong;chalt beon ibeaten. mid be&slong;mes &slong;wa bittre þat 
tu wummon were &slong;chal to wraðer heale iwurðen.  Swa 
muche quoð ha ich iwurðe him þe leouere: So ich derure 
þing for hi&slong; luue drehe. þat ti wil i&slong;: wurch nu. & he het 
hatterliche &slong;trupen hire &slong;teortnaket. & beten hire &slong;wa 
luðere þat hire leofliche lich: liðeri al oblode. & &slong;wa ha 
duden &slong;o luðere þat te blod &yogh;et adun of þe &yogh;erden. & heo  bigon to &yogh;eien.  Beaten &slong;o &yogh;e beaten &yogh;e beliales budele&slong;. ne mahe &yogh;e nowðer mi luue ne min bileaue lutlen toward 
him mi luf&slong;um leof mi leowinde lauerd ne nullich leauen  
ower read þat forreadeð ow &slong;eoluen. ne ower mix mawmex So in MS. þat beoð þe&slong; feonde&slong; fetle&slong; heien ne herien. for 
teone ne for tintreow þat &yogh;e mahen timbrin.  Na quoð he 
i&slong; hit &slong;wa hit &slong;chal &slong;utelin &slong;one. for ichulle biteachen 
mi&slong;lich þi bodi to elew&slong;ium þe riche reue irome ant he 
&slong;chal for&slong;welten ant forreden þe efter e&slong; wille wið alle&slong; 
cunne&slong; pinen. &yogh;e quoð þi&slong; meiden þat mei crist welden. for 
ne mahe &yogh;e nawt don me bute hwet he wule þeauien ow 
to muchelin mi mede & te murðe þat lið to meiðhade&slong; 
men&slong;ke for euer &slong;o &yogh;e mare merrið me her: &slong;o mi crune 
bið brihtre & fehere. for ichulle bliðeliche drehen euereuch 
derf for mi deore lauerdes luue. ant &slong;ofte me bið euch 
derf hwen ich him &slong;erui þah þu me to elew&slong;ium willes 
biteache: ne &yogh;eue ich for inc nowðer. þat &yogh;e me mahen 
harmen. for &slong;o &yogh;e mare me her harmeð. &slong;o mare &yogh;e me 
helpeð &slong;eoueuald to heouene. & &yogh;ef &yogh;e me doð to deaðe 
 
hit bið me deorewurðe ant ich &slong;chal þer þurh bliðe bicumen 
into endele&slong;e bli&slong;&slong;en ant &yogh;e &slong;chulen wrecches áwei 
ower wurðes þat &yogh;e iboren weren &slong;inken to wraðer heale 
ow to þe bale bitter deope into helle.  Hire feder affrican 
þurh þi&slong; bittre teone bitahte hire to elew&slong;ium þe luðere reue. ant he lette bringen hire biuoren him to hi&slong; heh 
&slong;eotel a&slong; he &slong;et in dome a&slong; reue of þe burhe a&slong; he biheold 
ant i&slong;eh hire leofliche leor lilies iliche & rudi a&slong; þe ro&slong;e & 
hire leofliche &slong;chape&meper; He &slong;ikede a&slong; þing þat &slong;are were 
iwundet hi&slong; mod feng to heaten ant hi&slong; meari to melten 
ant wiðinnen bernde of þe heate of hire luue &slong;wa þat him 
þuhte þat he ne bede na mare bli&slong;&slong;e in þi&slong;&slong;e liue bute 
hire bodi ane to wurchen hi&slong; wille ant feng on toward 
hire &slong;weteliche to &slong;eggen.  Mi lif ant mi leouemon. mi 
lefdi &yogh;ef þu wel wult biþench þat in rome riche&slong;t am  
ant iboren hehe&slong;t hwi de&slong;tu u&slong; ba &slong;o wa: þurh þi muchele 
unwit & wurchest &slong;o wraðe nulli þe na mare uuel þen þi 
&slong;eolf walde&slong;t ah leof me were þat tu þi luðere þonc lefde&slong;t. 
& te wel &slong;chulde wið alle wunne iwurðen. & neauer of þi 
wil ne &slong;chal þe nawt wontin. ant loke al&slong;wa þe lahen a&slong; al 
þat cun þat tu art of icumen. & akennet of: leueð ant 
luuieð hwi leaue&slong;tu ham þe ane. & wurðeð þe &slong;o laðe. ne 
wen þu nawt þe ane wið þi wi&slong;dom to ouer&slong;tihen ham alle. LEt quoð ha elew&slong;i ant &slong;tew &slong;wucche worde&slong; for 
ne beoð ha riht nohte&slong;. for &yogh;ef þu cneowe ant 
were cuð wið þe king þat i&slong; ouer alle kinge&slong; icrunet in 
heouene lutel walde&slong;tu leoten of ower lahele&slong;e lahen þet 
leareð ow to luten dedliche &slong;chaften a&slong; &yogh;e &slong;chulden to godd ant gremieð ower &slong;chuppent for þe cwike deoulen 
doð ham þrin on hwet &yogh;e bileueð ant hwen &slong;o &yogh;e herieð 
ham: &yogh;e herieð þen unhwiht ant buheð a&slong; to healent ant 
he wule ower hwile bitterliche &yogh;elden.  For ne wergeð he 
neauer to wurchen ow al þat wandreðe world á buten 
 
ende.  Do þat tu don wult for nullich þe nan oðer don 
bute &yogh;ef þu liðe ant leue min lare ant luuie godd al mihti 
ant leaue alle þe lahen þat tu li&slong;t inne. ME leof quoð elew&slong;iu&slong; &yogh;ef me &slong;wa biluuede hit were 
&slong;one i&slong;eid þe kei&slong;er ant ikudd to þe kinge. & he 
me walde warpen ut of mine wike ant demen me to deaðe. 
ant heo him on&slong;werede. &yogh;ef þu drede&slong;t &slong;o muchel an dedlich 
mon þe liueð al a&yogh;ein law ant leueð al hi&slong; luue in lifle&slong;e 
&slong;chaften: on hi&slong; &slong;chuppent &slong;cheome. & art offruht &slong;wa to 
leo&slong;en hi&slong; freontschipe. &slong;chuldich þenne for&slong;aken ihesu cri&slong;t 
godes &slong;une þe i&slong; ort ant ende of al. þat euer god i&slong;. þe wule 
hefter þi&slong; lif. þat ich lete lutel of. for hi&slong; luf&slong;um luue 
leue wið him &slong;eolf þe &slong;y ant þe &slong;elhðe of heouenriches 
wunnen. &slong;peche þu maht &slong;pillen ant ne &slong;peden nawiht þah 
þu me bu&slong;te ant beate a&slong; þat i&slong; bitaht te. & to derue pine 
don me ant te dreori deð. ne schaltu þah þu famon flea   me: ne &slong;chaltu &slong;eon me þe &slong;onre &slong;lakien to leuen ant te 
luuien godd alre gume lauerd. þe reue rudnede ant ogrome 
grede. &slong;trupeð hire &slong;teort naket. & &slong;trecheð hire on þe 
eorðe ant &slong;ix men beateð hire hwil ha mahten drehen. 
þat ha al we&slong; bigan mite blode & hwil ha hire beoten ha 
bigonne to &yogh;eien: þi&slong; i&slong; þe biginnunge of þe &slong;ar ant te 
&slong;cheome þat tu &slong;chalt drehen: bute þu to v&slong; beie. &yogh;et tu 
maht &yogh;ef þu wult burhen þe seoluen. ant &yogh;ef þu mare 
wið&slong;ei&slong;t: wa wurðe him wur&slong;t þat te me&slong;t &slong;parie. wondreðe 
to donne.  Doð quoð ha deaðe&slong; &slong;une&slong; al þat te 
deouel hwa&slong; driuele&slong; &yogh;e beoð driueð ow to donne. lutel 
i&slong; me of ower luue. la&slong;&slong;e of ower wraðe þat wite &yogh;e to 
wi&slong;&slong;e.  Nu cweðen heo wa him þenne þe ne wurche 
þe me&slong;t wa. þer wes &slong;orhe te &slong;eon hire leoflich lich  
faren &slong;o reowliche wið. & þuldeliche heo hit þolede for 
þe luue of drihtin ant hwen ha me&slong;t &slong;ar hefde &slong;ikerluke&slong;t 
ha &yogh;eide. halden on longe ne leaue &yogh;e neuer. for nullich 
leauen þi&slong; luue for luue. ne for eie. Þe reue þa he herde þi&slong; het hire hon up ant hongin 
biþe toppe. ant &slong;wa me dude &slong;one. & leiden &slong;wa 
luðerliche on hire on euch half. þat euch dunt defde into 
hire liche þat ha al bi&yogh;et on gure blode.  Lauerd godd 
almihti quoð heo þa. loke to þi meiden. þu fondede&slong;t abraham 
ant funde&slong;t him treowe þu lef me þat ich mote þe 
treowliche luuien. hald me min healent a&slong; þu haue&slong;t  bigunnen. for nabich na mahte bute of þi &slong;trencðe. ant 
on þe itru&slong;te nawt ome &slong;eoluen ant &slong;wuch hope ich habbe 
to þin help healent þat her ich habbe bihaten þe þat ne 
&slong;chal neauer mi luue ne min bileaue lutlin for na derf ne 
for nan wondreðe. ne for dute of deaðe þah ich hit &slong;chulde  
drehen. þa elew&slong;iu&slong; i&slong;eh þi&slong; þat ha þu&slong; feng on to fe&slong;tnen 
hire &slong;eoluen þohte þat he walde anan don hire ut of 
dahene & bed &slong;wiðe bringen hire brune of wallinde brea&slong; 
ant healden on hire heauet þat hit urne endelong hire leofliche 
bodi dun to þe helen ant &slong;wa me dude &slong;one. ah hire 
hende healent wi&slong;te hire unweommet. elew&slong;iu&slong; warð wod 
ut of hi&slong; witte. ant nu&slong;te hwet &slong;eggen & het &slong;wiðe don hire 
ut of hi&slong; eh&slong;ihðe. & dreihen hire into darc hu&slong; & pri&slong;une&slong; 
pine. ant he duden sone.  Heo a&slong; ha þrinne we&slong; in 
þeo&slong;terne&slong;&slong;e hire ane feng te cleopien to cri&slong;t ant bidden 
þeo&slong; bone. LAuerd godd al mihti. mi murhðe ant mi mede mi 
&slong;y ant mi &slong;elhðe þu i&slong;i&slong;t hu ich am bi&slong;taðet ant 
bi&slong;tonden fe&slong;tne mi bileaue &slong;teor me ant &slong;treng me. for  
al mi &slong;trencðe is uppon þe. mi feder. & mi moder for ich 
nulle for&slong;aken þe: habbeð for&slong;aken me & al mi ne&slong;t falde 
cun me heaneð þet &slong;chulden mine freond beon: beoð me 
me&slong;t feondes ant mine hinen me beoð me&slong;t heanen ah 
habbich þin ane&slong; help ich am wil cweme ne leaf þu me 
neuer liuiende lauerd as þu wi&slong;te&slong;t daniel bimong þe wode  leun&slong; ant te þreo children ananie zacharie mi&slong;ael inempnet. 
biwi&slong;te&slong;t unweommet from þe ferliche fur of þe furnei&slong;e 
&slong;wa þu wite ant witen me to witen me from &slong;unne. lauerd 
þurh þi&slong; lea&slong;e lif: lead me to le&slong;tinde to þe hauene of 
heale a&slong; þu ledde&slong;t i&slong;raele&slong; folc þurh þe reade &slong;ea buten 
&slong;chip druifot ant hare fan &slong;enchte&slong;t þat ham efter &slong;ohten 
afal þu mine famen ant to drif drihtin þen deouel þat 
me derueð. for ne mei na mon wið uten þi &slong;trencðe 
&slong;tonden him a&yogh;eines lef me þat ich mote i&slong;eon him &yogh;et  &slong;chent: þat weneð me to &slong;chrenchen ant &slong;chunchen of þe 
weie: þat leadeð to eche lif. wite me from hi&slong; lað ant wið 
hi&slong; crefti crokes. wite me wið mine unwines þat tu beo 
euer iheret ant iheiet in heouene ant in eorðe beo þu áá 
ible&slong;cet a&slong; þu were ant art. ant euer &slong;chalt beon in eche 
bli&slong;&slong;e. amen. Þa ha hefde ibeden þu&slong;. com a kempe of helle in 
englene heowe ant feng on to motin wið þi&slong; 
edie meiden.  Iuliane þe edie mi leof. þu haue&slong;t for 
mi luue muchel idrohen ant idrehen ant haue&slong;t for 
mi luue. feorliche fan þat te wið fehteð þat ogrome 
greieð þe alles cune&slong; pinen. ne mei ich hit þolien 
þat ha þu&slong; merren þe na mare þu haue&slong;t inoh min 
freont&slong;chipe of-&slong;eruet. me areoweð þi read ah hercne 
me nuðen. wurch elew&slong;iu&slong;es wil. for ich &yogh;eue þe leue.   þi&slong; meiden we&slong; awundret &slong;wiðe ant þah feng to freinen 
þu&slong; cweðinde. hwet hwiht art tu þat &slong;wuch word me 
bringe&slong;t. ich am quoð þat unwiht gode&slong; heh engel. for to

him þat tu on tru&slong;te&slong;t. Forloren beo þu reue wið fal&slong;e 
bileaue. & ible&slong;cet beo ihe&slong;u cri&slong;t mid alle hi&slong; icorne do þu  
dedlich on u&slong; al þat tu don maht.  Reue make u&slong; 
ananriht mi&slong;liche pinen. tend fur. & feche hweol & 
greiðe hwet &slong;o þu con&slong;t grimliche biþenchen. forðe 
al þi feder wil þe&slong; feonde&slong; of helle. to longe he heold 
u&slong; a&slong; he halt te &yogh;et. ah we &slong;chulen heonne uorð halden to 
ie&slong;u gode&slong; &slong;une moncun ale&slong;ent Swa þe reue gromede þat 
he gri&slong;patede a&yogh;ein þet wod he walde iwurðen. ant &slong;ende 
o wode wi&slong;e to maximien þe heh kei&slong;er in rome herof hwet 
he redde. ant he het euchan hefdes bikeoruen ant he lette 
&slong;wa don fif hundret bi tale of weopmen & of wummen an 
hundret ant þritti. euchan biuoren oðer forte beon hefde&slong; 
bicoruen ant ferden alle martir&slong; feire to cri&slong;te.  Elew&slong;iu&slong;  lette hi&slong; men makien a muche fur ant bed binden hire 
baðe fet ant honden ant ca&slong;ten hire into þe brune þer 
forto bernen. a&slong; ha bi&slong;eh uppard. ant &slong;eh þene ley leiten. 
ha lokede to heouene wið honden up aheuene ant þu&slong; to 
cri&slong;te cleopede wið inwarde bone. Mildheortfule godd milce þi meiden ne leaf þu me  
neauer nu in þi&slong; neode ah mit ti &slong;ofte grace &slong;alue 
mine &slong;unnen. Ie&slong;u mi &slong;elhðe ne warp þu me neauer ut 
of þin eh&slong;ihðe. bihald me ant help me ant of þi&slong;&slong;e reade 
leye ref me arude me þat þeo&slong; un&slong;elie ne þurue nawt 
&slong;eggen. þi lauerd þet tu luue&slong;t ant &slong;chulde þi &slong;cheld beon 
hwer i&slong; he nu meiden. Nefde ha buten i&slong;eid &slong;wa þat an 
engel ne com briht a&slong; þah he bernde ant iþat ferliche fur 
amidden riht lihte ant hit cwenchte anan euer euch &slong;perke. 
ant heo &slong;tod unweommet heriende hire hehe healent wið 
lude &slong;tefne. ÞE reue &slong;eh hit acwenct ant bigon te cwakien &slong;wa 
grimliche him gromede ant &slong;et þat balefule bea&slong;t 
as an bur&slong;t bar. þat grunde hi&slong; tu&slong;ke&slong;. ant feng on to femin 
ant te gri&slong;patien o þi&slong; meoke meiden. ant þohte on hwucche 
wi&slong;e he mahte hire awelden ant lette fecchen a feat. 
& wið pich hit fullen ant heaten hit walm hat. ant   het warpen hire þrin hwen hit wodeluke&slong;t weolle. a&slong; me 
dude hire þrin&meper; ha cleopede to drihtin ant hit colede anan ant 
warð hire a&slong; wun&slong;um. a&slong; euer eni wlech weter. þat were 
iwlaht te baðien. ant leop wallinde hat up a&yogh;ein þeo ilke 
þat hit hefden i&yogh;arket. ant for &slong;caldede of ham &slong;eoluen fifti 
ant tene. ant fordude fifti al italde. þa þe reue i&slong;eh þi&slong;&meper; he 
rende hi&slong; claðes ant toc him &slong;eoluen bi þe top. & feng to 
fiten hi&slong; mawmez & la&slong;ten hi&slong; lauerd. Swiðe quoð he ut 
of min eh&slong;ihðe. þat ich ne &slong;eo hire na mare er þe bodi wið 
þe buc beo i&slong;undret from hire heauet. SOne a&slong; ha þi&slong; iherde ha herede godd in heouene. & 
warð &slong;wiðe gled. For þet heo iwilnet hefde me 
ledde hire. & hleac forð ant heo we&slong; eð-luke a&slong; ha 
&slong;tutte oþe stude þer ha &slong;chulde deð drehen. þa com þe 
ilke belial of helle. þat ha hefde ibeaten hire bihinden. 
ant gon to &yogh;eien. a&meper; &slong;talewurðe men ne &slong;parie &yogh;e nawiht.  
ha haueð u&slong; alle &slong;cheome idon. &slong;chendeð hire nuðen ant 
&yogh;eldeð hire &yogh;arewborh ne &slong;tudgi &yogh;e neauer.  Iuliane þe edie 
openede hire ehnen ant lokede toward him. ant te bali 
blenchte. & braid him a&yogh;einward a&slong; an i&slong;choten arewe. wumme þat ich libbe quoð he þa ich beo nunan ilaht ant 
&yogh;ef ha keccheð me nu&meper; ne findi neauer leche. igripe ha 
me ene&slong;&meper; ne ga i neauer eft mare. ant leac him a&yogh;einward 
a&slong; a beore&meper; þet unwiht. ne mahte him nawt letten. a&slong; ha 
&slong;chulde &slong;tupen ant &slong;trecchen forð þe &slong;wire ha bed fir&slong;t ant 
feng on þu&slong; to learen þeo þet þer weren ant þus &slong;eide Lv&slong;teð me leoue men ant lideð ane hwile biwepeð. 
& bireow&slong;eð ower &slong;unnen. & la&slong;&slong;eð wið 
&slong;oð &slong;chrift. & wið dedbote. leaueð ower unlahen. 
& buldeð ower bolde&slong; uppon treowe &slong;taðele þat ne 
dredeð na wind ne na weder nowðer. lokeð þat te 
heouenlich lauerd beo grundwal of al þat &yogh;e wurcheð.  
for þat &slong;tont &slong;tudelfa&slong;t falle. cleopeð &yogh;eorne to godd 
in hali chirche þat he &yogh;eoue ow wit wel forte donne 
ant &slong;trenge ow wið hi&slong; &slong;trencðe a&yogh;ein þen &slong;tronge 
unwiht. þat &slong;eleð euer & áá ow forte &slong;wolhen. lu&slong;teð 
writen lare ant luuieð þrefter. wel i&slong; him þat wakeð 
wel in þi&slong; lutle hwile & witeð wel him &slong;eoluen. aut 
heorteliche &slong;ikeð ofte for hi&slong; &slong;unnen. þi&slong; world weint awei 
a&slong; weter þat eorneð ant a&slong; imet &slong;weuen a&slong;windeð hire 
murhðen ant al ni&slong; buten a le&slong; wind þat we liuieð. leaueð þe lea&slong;e ant luuieð þe &slong;oðe. for we &slong;chulen leten þi&slong; li&slong; 
nute we neauer hwenne ant reope we of þat ripe &slong;ed þat 
we &slong;eowen &slong;wiðe ich bi&slong;eche ow þat &yogh;e bidden for me&meper; 
breðren ant &slong;u&slong;tren & cu&slong;te ham a co&slong; of pe&slong; alle a&slong; ha 
&slong;toden ant biheold uppard ant hehede hire &slong;tefne. Lauerd godd al mihti þu luue&slong;t treowe bileaue ne lef 
þu to þin ifan þin ilicne&slong;&slong;e. ah underfeng me to  þe. & do me in þin englene hird wið meidne&slong; imeane. ich 
a&yogh;eoue to þe mi ga&slong;t drihtin. & wið þat ilke beide & def 
duuelunge dun to þer eorðe &slong;one bihefdet. ant þe edie 
engle&slong; wið hire &slong;awle &slong;inginde &slong;ihen toward heouene. 
&slong;oððen &slong;one þerefter com a &slong;eli wummon &slong;ophie inempnet. 
bi nicomede&slong; burh o rade toward rome. of heh cun akennet 
& nom þi&slong; meidene&slong; bodi. & ber hit in a bat biwunden 
deorliche in deorewurðe claðe&slong;. a&slong; ha weren in wettre com 
a &slong;teorm & draf ham to londe into campaine. & þer lette 
&slong;ophie from þe &slong;ea a mile &slong;etten a chirche & don hire bodi þrin 
in &slong;tanene þruh hehliche a&slong; hit deh alhen to donne. þe reue  þa he herde þi&slong;&meper; bigon te rowen efter forte reauen hit 
ham&meper; & iþe [&slong;ea] &slong;enchte. for þer ari&slong;en &slong;torme&slong; &slong;tarcke 
& &slong;tronge & breken þe &slong;chipe&slong; bord. adrenchten on hare þrittuðe &slong;um an þerto eke fowre. ant warp ham adriuen to 
þe londe. þer a&slong; wilde deor limel to luken ham & te un&slong;eli 
&slong;awlen &slong;uncken into helle. Þv&slong; þat edie meiden wende þurh pinen to heouenliche 
wunnen in þe nomecuðe burh nicomede hatte oþe 
&slong;ixtenðe dei of feouerele&slong; moneð. þe fortende kalende of 
mearch þat cumeð efter. heo u&slong; erndi to godd þe grace of 
him &slong;eoluen. þet rixleð in þreohad. & þah i&slong; an untweamet 
iheret ant iheiet wurðe he him ane a&slong; he is wurðe ant euer 
ah te beonne world abuten ende. AMEN.
1:
In a sixteenth-century hand, at the bottom of page 56 of the 
Bodleian Text, is the following:

Whan Judge at domesday dothe winnow his wheat And drives dustye chaffe into hellishe heat God make him a corne, in Eden to duell That owt of latine this treatise did freat And him that last wrote Amen.
text.2:
SEYN JULIAN (THE LIFE OF ST. JULIANA), FROM ASHMOLE MS. 43. SEyn Julian com of heie men&meper; as we fyndeþ iwrite. Cristene stilliche he bicom&meper; þat no mon ne scholde iwite. Maximan het þe emperour&meper; þat heþene was þo. Alle cristenemen he dude to deþe&meper; þat he mi&yogh;te of go. A gret maister he hadde vnder him&meper; þat het elise He wolde þat Julian to him&meper; iwedded scholde be. Wiþ hire fader and moder he spek&meper; so þat hi were at on. Þo he wende to þis holi maide&meper; and wende habbe is wille anon. Swete sire quaþ. Seyn Juliane&meper; it ne ualleþ no&yogh;t to me Bote þou were mon of more power&meper; to be ispoused to þe. Þis mon was glad uor þis word&meper; to þe emperour he wende. Noble &yogh;iftes he him &yogh;ef&meper; and fair present him sende. So þat he made him vnder him&meper; hext Justice of is londe. To don and hote wat he wolde&meper; uor is &yogh;ift and uor is sonde. Þis Justice wende to Juliane&meper; þo is power was. And wende hire habbe as is spouse&meper; ac he failede of is as. Þis maide him uaire vnswerde&meper; leue sire heo sede Bote we be boþe of one lawe&meper; we ne mowe no&yogh;t be of one rede Cristene womman icham iwis&meper; I ne reche ho it wite. Bicome cristene for my loue&meper; and me þou hast bi&yogh;ite. Sori was þis luþer man&meper; he nuste þo wat he mi&yogh;te. Wuste þis he sede Read (he sede). " if þe Emperor knew þis (said he) . þe emperour&meper; he wolde luþer þe di&yogh;te. &YOGH;if we cristene beþ boþe&meper; we worþeþ sone dede. Þenne our Ioie were al ido&meper; þat we scholde to gadere lede. Ihote " Commanded ." icham alle cristenemen&meper; to deþe do vp myn oþe. Þeruore lemmon turn þi þo&yogh;t&meper; and haue reuþe of ous boþe. Leue sire quaþ þat maide&meper; &yogh;if þou art adrad&meper; Of þe emperour þat is erliche " Earðly ." man&meper; iwis þou art amad. Þei is power be non such&meper; sone it wole ago. Ac dred god þat power haþ&meper; of ech þing euermo. Swiþe sori was þis luþer man&meper; þat he ne mi&yogh;te hire þo&yogh;t wende To habbe conseil of hire fader&meper; after him he let sende. Þo hi to gadere come&meper; to gadere hi made gret feste. And fondede hire clene þo&yogh;t&meper; to chaunge þoru uair biheste. Þo hi speke uairest wiþ hire&meper; þis maide hem &yogh;af answere Icholle holde þat ichabbe itake&meper; &yogh;e ne doþ me þer of no dere. At o word &yogh;e ne turneþ me no&yogh;t&meper; þer aboute &yogh;e spilleþ breþ. Doþ me wat pyne &yogh;e wolleþ&meper; uor I ne drede no&yogh;t þen deþ. Þe hi seie þat þis maide&meper; hire þo&yogh;t chaungi nolde. Hire fader bitok hire þe Justice&meper; to do wiþ hire wat he wolde. Þe Iustice let hire strupe naked&meper; and legge hire plat to grounde. Six kny&yogh;tes eode hire aboute&meper; and made hire mony a wounde. Hi leide hire on wiþ harde scorges&meper; þat hi weri were. Euer lay þis maide and lou&yogh;&meper; as hire noþing nere. Þo hi seie hire stable þo&yogh;t&meper; þat heo nas in none fere. Hi nome and henge hire up abem&meper; bi þe tresses of hire here. Þer bi heo heng half an day&meper; kny&yogh;tes bi neþe stode. Wiþ scourges hi leide euer vpon&meper; þat heo stremd al ablode. Þe more turment þat hi hire dude&meper; þe bet hi hire paide From Pacare. Þo hi ne mi&yogh;te hor wille habbe&meper; adoun hi nome þis maide. And bed hire turne biuore hire deþ&meper; hire þo&yogh;t on alle wise. And þench on hire heie kunne&meper; and hire owe gentrise. Þo hi ne mi&yogh;te uor noþing&meper; bringe hire of hire þo&yogh;t. A chetel wol of iwelled bras&meper; biuore þis maide was ibro&yogh;t. Hi &yogh;ote adoun aboue hire scoldren&meper; as heo vpri&yogh;t stod. Bi rug and wombe it orn adoun&meper; as it were flod. Fram þe necke to þe fot&meper; ech stude it þoru&yogh; sout&yogh;e. Euer stod þis holi maide&meper; as hire noþing ne rou&yogh;te. Louerd muche is þi my&yogh;te&meper; so muche iweld bras. In hire woundede bodi ne greuede no&yogh;t&meper; uair miracle þer was. Wod wroþ was þo þe Justice&meper; he het his men hire lede. In to strong prison and bounde hire faste&meper; uorte me nome oþer to rede. Corr. Uorte nime oþer rede. Þo þis maide in prison was&meper; þe deuel to hire wende. In fourme of an angel&meper; and sede þat our louerd him þuder sende. Forto saui hire fram þe deþ&meper; and wissi hire wel to done. Þat heo tormentes uorte fle&meper; dude Should do . þe Justices bone. Vor our lord hadde of hire reuþe&meper; and wilnede hire lif. And leuere hadde þen heo were ded&meper; þat heo were iwedded to wif. Þis maide stod in grete þo&yogh;t&meper; þat he hire þerto gan rede. And þat our lord hire so het&meper; bi him as he sede. Heo sat akne and bad our lord&meper; þat he hire scholde lere. Compare On cneowum sittende Ælfr. Oros. III. ix. Wel to done and warny ek&meper; wat þe messager were. As heo sat in hire orison&meper; heo hurde a uois þat sede. Be studeuast in þi bileue&meper; and ich þe wole wel rede. Ac þe messager aske wat he be&meper; and ne haue of him no drede. And nym him uaste uor icholle&meper; be wiþ þe in eche neode. Þo þe maide þis ihurde&meper; þen deuel heo nom wel uaste. Heo made þe signe of þe crois&meper; and to hire fet him caste. Tel me heo sede wat þou art&meper; oþer icholle þe quelle. Leuedi he sede let me go&meper; and icholle þe sone telle. Nay þou schalt abide her&meper; þis maide sede þo. Vorte þou me telle wat þou art&meper; and þanne þou schalt go. Þo sede he icham a deuel&meper; ich hote belial. A&yogh;en ech mannes good dede&meper; ich can do luþer gal. Þo adam and eue wolde&meper; in godes seruice be. Ich hem bro&yogh;te in dedliche sunne&meper; þoru þe apel of þe tre. Bitwene caym was muche loue&meper; and abel is broþer. Ich made þoru a lutel enuye&meper; þat on sle þat oþer. Ich made ihesus on þe rode deie&meper; ac þat we seþþe abo&yogh;te. And herodes þe children sle&meper; þo me ihesus so&yogh;te Ichabbe ymad men oþer sle&meper; and scipes in þe se drenche. Alle wo ichabbe anerþe ido; þat man may on þenche. Ho sende þe huder quaþ þe maide&meper; þe deuel a&yogh;en sede. Satan oure maister þat is atom&meper; þat schal ous alle rede. &YOGH;if he send &yogh;ou quaþ þis maide&meper; to eny holi manne. And &yogh;e ne mowe him no&yogh;t ouercome&meper; wat deþ he wiþ &yogh;ou 
þanne. Þanne ne dorre we quaþ þe deuel&meper; biuore our maister wende. Oure acountes uorte &yogh;elde&meper; æ he let ous of sende. And &yogh;if we awer beþ ifounde&meper; he let ous bete sore. Þer uore wenne we fyndeþ eny mon&meper; stable in godes lore. We fondeþ him in luþer þo&yogh;t&meper; to bringe myd al our mi&yogh;te. Ac anon he mai ous ouercome&meper; &yogh;if he wole a&yogh;en ous fi&yogh;te. Vor we nabbeþ power no mon to bringe&meper; in sunne a&yogh;en is mode. Vor ihesus bynom ous þulke mi&yogh;te&meper; þo he deide on þe rode. Of al þat ichabbe anerþe igo&meper; so clanliche ouercome. Neuer Inas as ich nou am&meper; my mi&yogh;te me is bynome. Maide uor þyn hendescipe&meper; þou haue mercy of me. Let me go at þis one tyme&meper; Ine schal neuereft derie þe. Alas þat Inadde er iwust: wat me scolde bitide. Certes quaþ þe maide þo&meper; &yogh;ut þou schalt abide. Þis maide nom þis &slong;oule best&meper; and faste it gan bynde. Myd a raketeie þat aboute hire was&meper; his honden him bihinde. Myd anoþer Irene raketeie&meper; heo bet him swiþe sore. And euer sede þis foulde best&meper; hende maide þyn ore. Haue reuþe of þi wreche prison&meper; and þench þat þou art fre. Inabbe icome nei non&meper; þat me dorste hondli ne ise. And þou me darst þus tormenti&meper; alas wi ne mai ich fle. Wi artou so strong maidenhod&meper; þat þou ne mi&yogh;t ouercome be. Alas maidenhod alas&meper; wi woltou wiþ ous fi&yogh;te. Maidens ichulle euereft drede&meper; Inabbe a&yogh;en hem no mi&yogh;te. Þe wule þis maide tormentede&meper; þus þis foule wi&yogh;t. Þe Justice het þis maide uette&meper; biuore him anon ri&yogh;t. Þe maide nom þis foule best&meper; and after hire it drou&yogh;. Leue leuedi he sede þin ore&meper; iscend icham Inou&yogh;. Ne make þou namo men gawen on me&meper; nartou corteis and hende. Þench þat maidens scolde milde be&meper; and bring me of þis bende. War " Where ." is kunde of þi maidenhod&meper; þat scholde be milde and stille. And þou art a&yogh;en me so sturne&meper; hou mi&yogh;tou habbe þe wille. So longe he on þis maide cride&meper; as heo him drou&yogh; and ladde. After hire þoru cheping&meper; þat reuþe of him heo hadde. A chaumbre foreine heo isei&meper; al ope to ward þe strete. Vol it was of uelþhede&meper; old and al uorlete. Þis maide nom þis foule þing&meper; and caste it amydde. Dai þat wolde neschere Softer . bed&meper; him biseche oþer bidde. Vor it was good Inou to him&meper; bineþe and eke aboue. Wat seggeþ &yogh;e segge ich soþ&meper; ne lie&yogh; no&yogh;t for is loue. &YOGH;ut nolde þis luþer men&meper; þat iseie al þis dede. Bileue on god and turne hor þo&yogh;t&meper; ac þe more hire wiþ sede. Þo heo biuore þe Justice com&meper; hi wolde chaunge hire þo&yogh;t. And bihete hire prute and gret nobleie&meper; ac al ne huld it no&yogh;t. A weol of Ire swiþe strong&meper; biuore hire hi caste. Al were þe velion Fellies . aboute&meper; wiþ rasours istiked faste. Þe weol hi turnde abonte&meper; þe maide þer bi hi sette. Depe wode in hire naked flech&meper; þe rasours kene iwette. Whetted . Þat þo hire flech was al icorue&meper; so depe hi wode and gnowe. Þat þe bones hi to slitte&meper; and þe marw out drowe. Þe marw sprong out al aboute&meper; so ouercome heo was Þat heo al mest &yogh;ef þen gost&meper; and no wonder it nas. Of al þat me drou hire tender lymes&meper; it ne reu hire no&yogh;t enes sore. Ac euer sede þat ihesu crist&meper; þolede uor hire more. Glade were þo þe luþer men&meper; þat so nei þe deþe hire seie. Ac our louerdes wille nas it no&yogh;t&meper; þat heo scholde þe &yogh;ut deie. An angel myd a naked swerd&meper; to þe weol ali&yogh;te And hew it al to smale peces&meper; þer was godes mi&yogh;te. And þis maide eode uorþ al hol&meper; as hire noþing nere. Sore dradde þis luþer men&meper; þat þere aboute were. Our lord crist can so is fon&meper; wen is wille is afere. Vif hondred turnde to him&meper; uor þulke miracle þere. And an hondred wemmen and þritti&meper; þer ne bileuede no&yogh;t on. Þat þis luþer men in þe place&meper; ne let biheuedi echon. Toward þis maide þe Justice&meper; uor wraþþe was nei wod. He let make of wode and col&meper; a strong fur and good. Amydde he let þis maide caste&meper; uor heo frobrenne scholde. Hi wende hire to sle anon&meper; ac our lord it nolde. An angel þer com and þis fur&meper; to spradde wide and drou&yogh;. Amydde þe place þe maide stod&meper; harmles and glad Inou&yogh;. Heo þonkede god and sat akne&meper; and hire orison sede. Þe Justice sede wat scholle we do&meper; wat schal ous to rede. We ne scholle þis foule wiche&meper; ouercome wiþ no dede. &YOGH;if no fur ne mai hire brenne&meper; in led we scholle hire brede. A chetel he sette ouer þe fur&meper; and fulde it uol of lede. Þis maide isei þis led boili&meper; heo nas noþing in drede. Anon so heo was þer Inne ido&meper; þat fur bigan to sprede. Fram þe chetel it hupte aboute&meper; in lengþe and in brede. Sixti men and seuentene&meper; it barnde in þe place. Of luþer men þat stode þer bi&meper; þer was godes grace. Amydde þe chetel þis maide stod&meper; al hol wiþþoute harm. Þat led þat bolynde was&meper; vnneþe it þo&yogh;te hire warm. Þe Justice bigan to wepe and crie&meper; þo he þis isei Vor is men uorbarnd were&meper; witles he was nei. Wat doþ &yogh;e he sede myne godes&meper; is &yogh;oure mi&yogh;te &yogh;ou bynome Schal a womman wiþ hire wichinge&meper; ous alle ouercome. Helpeð me nou &yogh;if &yogh;e mowe&meper; þat we ne be bro&yogh;t to scame. Heo ne schal me wraþþi þus nammore&meper; Ichulle pleie anoþer 
game. Com uorþ he sede my manquellare&meper; led þis hore fram me. And smyt of hire heued wiþþoute þe toun&meper; þat ich neuereft hire ise. Glad was þis holi maide&meper; þo heo wuste hire ende. Vor heo wuste after hire tormentes&meper; wider heo scholde wende. Heo þonkede uaste Ihesu crist&meper; þat after hire wolde sende. Go swiþe heo sede to þe quellare&meper; and bring me of þis bende. As me ladde þis holi maide&meper; toward hire martirdom. Belial þis foule deuel&meper; wel glad bihynde com. Ne spareþ no&yogh;t he sede ac heieþ uaste&meper; þat heo of dawe be. Nabbeþ of hire nammore reuþe&meper; þen heo hadde of me. Nolde heo noþing spare me&meper; of al þat ich hire bad. Vnneþe ich dar on hire loke&meper; so sore icham adrad. Þo þis maide hurde þis&meper; hire eien up heo caste. A out out þe deuel sede&meper; holdeþ hire nou uaste. Leste heo efsone cacche me&meper; and þat me vuel bitidde. Fle ichulle þe wule&meper; ich mai&meper; doþ þat ich &yogh;ou bidde. Ac þei heo him hadde icau&yogh;t&meper; and ileid as clene. In as uair bed as heo dude er&meper; dait þat him wolde bymene. Bemoan . Þo heo com to þulke stude&meper; as heo scholde biheded be. To our lord heo made hire orison&meper; and sat adoun akne. Þe quellare as heo bed hire beden&meper; adrou&yogh; is swerd wel kene. He smot of hire heued fram þe bodi&meper; þat it uel in þe grene. Angles were &yogh;are anon&meper; hire soule uorte auonge. Þus heo bo&yogh;te þe blisse of heuene&meper; wiþ tormentes stronge. Hire bodi hi lette ligge&meper; hi nolde it burie no&yogh;t. Vor bestes it scholde todrawe&meper; and þat was hore þo&yogh;t. A good womman þat het sophie&meper; wonede þer biside. Burie heo þo&yogh;te þat holi bodi&meper; wat so hire scholde bitide. Vor þer nere none cristenemen&meper; lede heo it þo&yogh;te to rome. Al bi scipe to burie it þere&meper; ac þo hi in to þe scipe come. Þe wynd com and drof hor scip&meper; in to anoþer londe. In to þe londe of campanye&meper; and þer it gan at stonde. Þo hi ne mi&yogh;te hor scip þanne bringe&meper; hi nome þoru godes grace. And burede þis bodi in þe se&meper; in a wel uaire place. Þer it is &yogh;ut uaire honoured&meper; ac þo þe tiding was icome. To þe Justice þat þis bodi was&meper; awei ilad and ynome. He nom wiþ him uoure and þritti men&meper; and afterward he gan wende. &YOGH;if he mi&yogh;te þis bodi of take&meper; more he þo&yogh;te it scende. Amidde þe se þer com a wynd&meper; as it were uor þe none. And caste hor scip vp to doun&meper; and adreynte hem euerichone. Þe Justice wreche bodi seþþe&meper; þe se to londe caste. And bestes and foweles it to drowe&meper; þe wile þer apece ilaste. Þo hadde he is owe dom&meper; þat he wolde þe maide scende. Þus Seyn Julian þe holi maide&meper; hir lif bro&yogh;te to ende.
